name: Whittier
shortDescription: A historic city with a vibrant Uptown, trails, and community spirit in southeast Los Angeles County.
fullDescription: Whittier blends historic charm with suburban comfort. Centered around Uptown Whittier's shops and restaurants, the city also features the Whittier Greenway Trail, local parks, and cultural attractions. With convenient access to neighboring cities and major freeways, Whittier appeals to families, professionals, and students of nearby colleges alike.
heroImageAlt: Tree-lined street with shops and pedestrians in a historic district

highlights.title: Uptown Whittier
highlights.description: Historic district with cafes, boutiques, weekend markets, and community events.

highlights.title: Whittier Greenway Trail
highlights.description: Popular multi-use trail for walking and biking across the city.

highlights.title: Pio Pico State Historic Park
highlights.description: State historic site celebrating California history and the life of P√≠o Pico.

highlights.title: Parks & Recreation
highlights.description: Multiple neighborhood parks, sports facilities, and community programs.

faqs.question: What is Whittier known for?
faqs.answer: Whittier is known for its historic Uptown district, the Whittier Greenway Trail, and strong community feel.

faqs.question: How is the real estate market in Whittier?
faqs.answer: Whittier offers a mix of historic homes and suburban neighborhoods with competitive pricing for LA County.

faqs.question: What can you do in Whittier?
faqs.answer: Stroll Uptown Whittier, bike the Greenway Trail, visit Pio Pico State Historic Park, and enjoy local eateries.

faqs.question: How is commuting from Whittier?
faqs.answer: Convenient access to I-605 and SR-60 with routes to Los Angeles, Orange County, and the San Gabriel Valley.
